Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What is it, jerk? Are you trying to get
your hands on these <clr:0000>spikes<clr:ffff>?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Tch... Bought out all my stock, huh?


Getting to walk past that looming wall of
spikes was such a thrill too... Oh, well.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Think>*sigh* Now I need to rebuild my
spike collection...
Talk_04:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hyaaah!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL><sp:0:2:2:6400>Hyeh hyeh hyeh. Did I scare ya? Just
having a little bit of fun...

But if you try to lay a hand on one of my
babies again...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00>

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Think><sp:0:2:2:6400>I really will cut you.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Do not...<sp:5:1:0>lay a hand on my babies. <sp:5:0:0>I told
you that already.

Or do you want to get cut?


If you want some spikes of your own,
come over here and we'll get you
squared away.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Hyeh hyeh... Aww, how cute. You're too
scared to embrace the spikes.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Don't talk to me if you're not here
for business.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Hyeh hyeh... How I love my little <clr:0000>spikes<clr:ffff>.
There's something so deliciously
dangerous about having them around...
Hey, jerk...


<sp:3:0:2:0900>Anyone ever tell you it's rude to stare?
Don't tell me you're here to get some
<clr:0000>spikes <clr:ffff>of your very own!
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Don't try to sell me anything weird, or I'll
toss ya on the spikes!
Com_Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hyeh hyeh hyeh... All right, all right,
what're ya sellin'?
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0900>I don't want that. Sell me something else.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Hyeh hyeh hyeh, are you for real?
You wanna sell me your uniform?<sp:5:1:0>
If that's a joke, I'm not laughing.
Com_Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Hyeh hyeh...<sp:5:1:0>huh?


<sp:3:0:2:0900>Why show me something if you're not
gonna sell it?!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Hyeh hyeh...<sp:5:1:0>huh?


<sp:3:0:2:0900>You trying to pull a fast one on me?
You're broke!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd just restocked my spiky babies too...


But I guess they are for sale, so I can't
really stop you. Hand over <clr:0000>100 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Think>Which spikes would allow for the most
vengeful Link-skewering?<sp:0:4:0>That's what's on my mind right now.
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Don't sell me anything weird, OK, weirdo?
